description: Maybe you still remember my last trip to Decin. This lovely small town in northern Bohemia where I was born. Well, I went there again. Already on the way to my old school I met the first boy. Damn, he was cute. And I was so close to persuade him. But then suddenly he got a call from a friend. Well, I tried my luck a few more times. And finally - just after sunset - I encountered a nice boy with wonderful blue eyes. He was a smart-ass. And indeed smart enough to accept my offer to pay him 3000 Crowns for showing me his cock. And as I could see that he was eager for more money he offered me to follow him to the old garden of his parents. Now guess what happened this winter-day in this remote hut, huh.
title: Czech Hunter 73
